mean_cn: n. 家庭生活，专心于家务，对家庭的挚爱
mean_en: life inside a home :the activities of a family or of the people who share a home
word_etyma: domestic家庭 + ity名词后缀 → 有家的感觉的状态 → domesticity 家居生活
sentence: Housewives live a life of domesticity, spending much of their times cleaning and cooking.
sentence_trans: 家庭主妇过着专心于家务的生活，花大量时间来打扫、煮饭。
